name: SWat Sniper Prison Escape
description:
SWat Sniper Prison Escape is a 3rd person riot control game, seen from the perspective from a prison guard on sniper duty. His goal is to prevent prison riots and fight, scan the yard to find out what prisoners are looking for trouble.
FEATURES:
- Enjoy realistic gun simulation and animation in this sniper shooter game
- 10 levels and 40 challenging waves to accomplish
- Lots of 3D sniper weapons to buy and upgrade
- Realistic 3D prison environment
